name: Sort By Play Count
description: Sorts Songs by Play Count, Global Scrobbles, Personal Scrobbles Using Last.FM

name: Play on YouTube
description: Plays the Video Song of a Track in YouTube

name: Skip or Play Liked Songs
description: This Extension Skips or Plays Liked Songs only

name: Seek Song
description: This Extension Seeks Song when you press 1 to 9 for 10 % to 90 % of the song and left and right arrow Seeks backward and forward for 10 seconds

name: Play Enhanced Songs
description: Plays only the Enhanced Songs from a playlist, even other's playlist

name: Spotify Genres
description: See what Genres you are listening to with Spotify Genres Extension
